author: geirm
msg: Made the change suggested by Jose Alberto Fernandez <JFernandez@viquity.com>.  It results in a significant performance improvement in reference-heavy template processing.

author: jvanzyl
msg: - adding a little test for maps, making sure the ClassCastException
is caught and the reference error is logged.

author: jvanzyl
msg: - make the MapExecutor a little more efficient and catch
the ClassCastException that may occur when a method/property
name isn't correct and ASTIdentifier assumes it's a Map when
it really isn't.

author: jvanzyl
msg: - a template loader unification proposal: use the same underlying
mechanism for template text and static text.

author: jvanzyl
msg: - The ASTIfStatement has been cleaned up and once again uses
polymorphism to determine which node gets rendered. ASTElseStatement
and ASTElseIfStatement once again know how to evaluate themselves
and render themselves so the case statement has been removed.
Also when the correct node is rendered the render() method
exits instead of passing over every subsequent node. When
an #if(true) occurred, every #elseif(expression) was still
passed over. This has been corrected.
